author: thelabdude
msg: SOLR-6444: Use distrib=false to ensure real-time get request only hits the replica we're testing for proper recovery.

author: lgo
msg: Revert the changes in [1] that added the new "http-pipelining" option.
The issue that triggered addition of this option - serf issue 135: ssl
renegotiation breaks when there are pipelined requests - has been solved
More specifically: serf 1.4 will automatically disable http pipelining for
connections to a server that initiates a SSL renegotiation.

author: schor
msg: no Jira - modify two things from "private" to "protected" to allow useful subclassing of this class.
